name: Snail Party Discovery Adventure
description:
This game was developed over 3 sessions of an "Intro to Interactive Game Design" workshop I hosted at Public Space One. I handled the coding aspect while the art and audio assets were produced by folks attending the workshop.

Credits:

  • Kalmia Strong
  • Desiree Dahl
  • Sayuri Sasaki Hemann
  • Derek Andes
  • Austin Caskie
